title: Which is the best technology to start as fresher in software? I don't have any kind of programming experience. - Quora
tags: Jobs and Careers in Computer Programming
Jobs and Careers in Software Engineering

response.answer_text: If your definition of “Best Technology” is “The Technology that pays more”, then there’s no such thing. There are all kinds of technologies and languages in use today (including Mainframes and Cobol), and every one who has a passion and mastery over any technology/language can still survive and probably make money. If you are really passionate about a career in software, you may try: Subscribe to a tutorial website like Pluralsight.Watch some of their courses in C#, Java, PHP etc. Get a taste of those languages.See what your heart tells you and follow that.

Start with an application, and let that drive your technology selection. Programming is like writing - it has to be about something. Start with your subject matter. If you understand bookkeeping, start with spreadsheets, Excel macros, and vBasic extensions. If you’re a musician, start with a synthesizer, and Audacity, then write plug-ins. If you work with lab instruments, learn Labview. Etc.
